meanings.sent1: She was gudgeoning her friend into believing a tall tale.
meanings.sent2: He enjoys gudgeoning people with his magic tricks.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat was gudgeoning the birds by pretending to be asleep.
meanings.sent4: The politician was gudgeoning the public with false promises.
meanings.sent5: The sly fox was gudgeoning the rabbit with his cunning ways.

meanings.definition: The act of deceiving or tricking someone.
meanings.sent1: His gudgeoning of others eventually caught up with him.
meanings.sent2: The art of gudgeoning requires a clever mind.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show had a hilarious skit about gudgeoning gone wrong.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, gudgeoning can lead to serious consequences.
meanings.sent5: The detective saw through the criminal's gudgeoning tactics.
